Training And Resources

Here you can find details of our training courses and access free guides and tutorials.

Courses

We teach trajectory modelling and related research methods at Bristol Medical School Short Courses and MSc Programs. These inlcude:

  • Analysis of Repeated Measures Short Course
  • Statistical Methods for Mediation Analysis Short Course
  • Introduction to R Short Course
  • MSc Medical Statistics and Health Data Science
  • MSc Epidemiology

We also occasionally organise researcher workshops - these will be advertised in our news page and through our Seminar Series mailing list (joining details here)
